entry.title: ethanmys/Vending-machine
entry.summary: State machine controls reset, accepting/counting inserted coins, evaluating -- selection cost, vending the product (light led) and resetting for another vend -- An independant process watches for slider switch transitions and tallys coins -- My seg muxer was reused to display on the seven-seg display and a function was -- included to convert heâ€¦
